: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw watched as Perceptor shot KitKat with a dart, and then heard him yell. SharpClaw had enough of this bot.
SharpClaw sends a backhand at Perceptor with his claws extended. He was trying to take Perceptor's head clean off.
SharpClaw: You have angered me. Not a good choice!
 airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Perceptor:

"You need a nap..."said Perceptor as the a light red button of his 
gun turned to blue and a dart was shot against Kitkat.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> KitKat::
> 
> She looked at Perceptor. "I will never give up as long as power 
flows 
> through my spark, never."  looks at SharpClaw. "I'll tackle you in 
a 
> minute."  her head rolls forward, looks up with her optics at 
> Perceptor. "I can." coughs " still take you."
